TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_hangul, title = hangul, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/hangul} }

S.FORM: nakemasi "pakituluan tua ljingav nua tja kai (hunminjeongeum)" aicu a hangul (sinivecik nua hinankukuan: ; sinivecik nua binaljakan: Hangeul) mavan a sinivecik nua sihu nua sehankuk tua hinankukuan (kai nua sehankuk). na kitjuveqac ti sezung satjaljavavavan (Sejong the Great) tua hangul, saka papukeljangi taicu a sinivecik kemasi tua patagiljan tua 1900 a cavilj a patje tucu. a tja kineljang tu aicu a tja siaya a hangul avan a pinapungadan ni djusetjing ( ; Ju Si gyeong), pasamalavi tua patarevan nua hangul mavan a tjaljananguaqan a qaca a vecik ljaki qaca a vecik. saka aza vecik a namayatua sikudakuda nua sehankuk. kinasizuanan
